|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0007 |subvendor_id = 1385 |subdevice_id = 4300 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PY3HA311 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:09:5B
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5210; |chip2 = Atheros;AR5110; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/07/2002 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The old '''NETGEAR''' gear man logo, "HA311", "REV-A0", and "2976185305" :is silkscreened on the card in the FCC photos. ''[[Delta Networks]]'' is the presumed OEM.
IDs quoted in the driver include 168c:0007 (168c:0207), see also :(168c:0107, 168c:1107, 168c:0006, 168c:0005, 168c:0105) This device appears to be [[Atheros]] AR5000 based.
==Links of Interest== *[http://tuto.netgear-forum.com/Documentation/Chipsets/ ''Chipset table'' on Netgear forum]
